top_comments_top.body:
Don’t Mind If I Do by George Strait

It’s very jazzy and laid back, this is basically him showcasing his Sinatra influence instead of his country influences. I wish I could live this song out in real life lol. It’s in my top 10 songs of all time. 

https://youtu.be/8zwBnTC1JTA

Bath of Fire - The Presidents of the United States of America. 

Just a great song.
